Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Extends the metropolitan transportation authority's half fare rate program to persons receiving benefits from the supplemental nutrition assistance program
Summary: Extends the metropolitan transportation authority's half fare rate program to persons receiving benefits from the supplemental nutrition assistance program.
LawCode: Amd ยง1266, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to extending the metropolitan transportation authority's half fare rate program to persons receiving benefits from the supplemental nutrition assistance program
